alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 8:13PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern St. Louis, northeastern Carlton and southwestern Lake Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 813 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Boulder Lake, to near Pike Lake Near Duluth, to Fond Du Lac Band Sawyer Area, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Boulder Lake, Pike Lake Near Duluth and Island Lake around 820 PM CDT. Hermantown around 825 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Scanlon, Carlton, Thomson, City of Rice Lake and Proctor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive through flood waters.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Southern Lake, North Shore
